text:
I tried to download the 1.1.3 release of log4j at 
http://jakarta.apache.org/log4j/jakarta-log4j-1.1.3.tar.gz
through the jakarta->log4j->downloads->archive page
(http://jakarta.apache.org/log4j/docs/earlier.html)

but the tar.gz file contains log4j 1.0.4!
creator: charris@beercommittee.com

text:
Just tested it. http://jakarta.apache.org/log4j/jakarta-log4j-1.1.3.tar.gz
contains log4j-1.1.3. What makes you think it's 1.0.4?
creator: ceki@apache.org
charris@beercommittee.com
text:
My apologies. It looks like some bizarre manifestation of the way Winzip 
handles tar.gz files, and my tmp directory. Needless to say I can't reproduce 
it now and 1.1.3 appears.
